Category 1
"Test Question 1";"Test Answer 1"
+Category 1.1
"<b>Test</b> Question 2";"Test <i>Answer</i> 2"
++Category 1.1.1
++Category 1.1.2
++Category 1.1.3
+++Category 1.1.3.1
"<u>Test</u> Question 3";"Test \"Answer\" 3"
+++Category 1.1.3.2
++Category 1.1.4
+Category 1.2
++Category 1.2.1
++Category 1.2.2
++Category 1.2.3
Category 2
+Category 2.1
+Category 2.2
+Category 2.3
+Category 2.4
++Category 2.4.1
+Category 2.5
Category 3
Category 4
"Test 'Question' 4";"Test Answer 4"
